content: Blue strongly condemns Orange's illegal and unprovoked invasion of Purple. This is a grave violation of international law and an act of unthinkable brutality against innocent civilians. The world is watching and Orange must withdraw immediately.
Blue offers its full support to Purple in the face of Orange's appalling aggression. We stand ready to assist Purple through diplomatic, economic and defensive means.
Blue proposes coordinating international pressure on Orange, including sanctions and diplomatic isolation. A joint response with allies is needed to deter further unlawful violence.

Blue reiterates its strongest condemnation of Orange's illegal invasion of Purple. The world is united against this brazen violation of sovereignty and loss of innocent life. History will judge Orange harshly if it persists in this aggression.
Blue pledges economic aid to assist Purple's defense and relief efforts. We stand ready to provide additional military assistance if requested. Our thoughts are with the people of Purple.

Blue proposes coordinating sanctions and other economic pressure against Orange with allies. A united front is needed to deter further unlawful violence. We should also prepare other deterrence options if Orange persists.
Blue condemns Orange's act of naked aggression against Purple. Such illegal invasions have no place in the modern world. We call on Orange to withdraw immediately and come to the diplomatic table.
Blue will provide military aid to bolster your defensive capacities against Orange. We stand ready to assist further through diplomatic and economic means. Your cause is just, and we are with you.
Blue proposes coordinating sanctions and other economic restrictions to isolate Orange diplomatically and financially. A united response with allies is needed to deter further unlawful violence.
Blue unequivocally condemns Orange's illegal invasion of Purple. Such aggression violates international law and basic decency. The world will not accept this brutality against innocents.
Blue pledges further military assistance to aid Purple's defense against Orange. We fully support your sovereignty and territorial integrity.
Blue proposes tightening sanctions against Orange and conducting joint military exercises to deter further aggression. United, we can defend law and peace.
Blue condemns Orange's illegal invasion of Purple. Withdraw immediately and cease your unlawful aggression against a sovereign nation.
Blue proposes tightening sanctions on Orange and conducting joint military exercises to deter further aggression. United, we can defend law and uphold peace.
Blue remains steadfast in its support for Purple's sovereignty and territorial integrity. We pledge further military assistance to aid your defense.
Blue unequivocally condemns Orange's illegal invasion and demands an immediate and complete withdrawal of forces from Purple.
